Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: A summary of the posts shows that people have been discussing various issues lately including the federal budget regional infrastructure and food relief efforts. While some politicians praised the budget's new measures others faulted it for not doing enough for specific sectors. Additionally there is significant concern over the growing demand for food relief among charities and communities while others talked about the significance of consistent policy messaging in politics. Finally there are also hints of future political discussions on various programs.
